subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: The United States Open champion Lucas Glover had another big stretch of birdies on his way to the lowest 36-hole score at Kapalua in five years and a three-shot lead in the SBS Championship in Hawaii.
snippet: The United States Open champion Lucas Glover had another big stretch of birdies on his way to the lowest 36-hole score at Kapalua in five years and a three-shot lead in the SBS Championship in Hawaii.
